author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

The algorithm to define the crystal matrix of Hcal Test Beam to the style of DD4Hep

#### PR validation:

It has been tested using a test script in Geometry/HcalAlgo/test. In the process of testing it, it was discovered that DD4Hep has some inadequacy which needs to be addressed before moving to the new code style

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR:

Nothing special
title: Run3-hcx219 Transform one more DDD algorithm to DD4Hep type
